overview: Raymond Cheung has more than fifteen years of operations and technical management experience in technology and fiber optics component industries. Dr. Cheung joined NeoPhotonics in June 2007 as VP Product Engineering in NeoPhotonics China and he was subsequently appointed VP R&D there. Dr. Cheung has previously held senior technical, operations and management positions with SAE Magnetics (TDK Corp), Hong Kong Applied Science & Technology Research Institute and Philips Semiconductors. Dr. Cheung received a PhD degree in Materials and Mechanics from Cambridge University (England) and BEng in Mechanical Engineering from Kingâ€™s College, London (England).
